opennlp.ccg.parse.supertagger.ml
Class STPriorModel

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.ngrams.ConditionalProbabilityTable
      opennlp.ccg.parse.supertagger.ml.STPriorModel

public class STPriorModel
extends ConditionalProbabilityTable

(c) (2009) Dennis N. Mehay

Author:
Dennis N. Mehay Model for predicting p(supertag | word, pos). Uses an ARPA-formatted SRILM-trained "unigram" factored LM for this, where each "unigram" is a bundle of word:pos:supertag.

Field Summary

getRestrictedBetaBestPriors

public List<Pair<String,Double>> getRestrictedBetaBestPriors(Word w,
                                                             double beta)
Get the beta-best tags (using the prior model) only from among the POS-dictionary-allowed possibilities. beta-best (def'n): {t | p(t) >= beta * p(best-tag) }

getRestrictedBetaWorstPriors

public List<Pair<String,Double>> getRestrictedBetaWorstPriors(Word w,
                                                              double beta)
Get the beta-WORST tags (using the prior model) only from among the POS-dictionary-allowed possibilities. beta-best (def'n): {t | p(t) >= beta * p(best-tag) } beta-worst (def'n): {t | p(t) * beta <= p(worst-tag)}

getAllPriors

public List<Pair<String,Double>> getAllPriors(Word w)

getNBestPriors

public List<Pair<String,Double>> getNBestPriors(Word w,
                                                int n)
Get the n-best supertags on the prior model, given this word (with POS).
